ComicInfo.Characters: Bossy Hog,Sheriff Rascal P. Soultrain,Boo Dork,Cuke Dork,Uncle Fussy Dork,Dizzy Dork
ComicInfo.Title: The Dorks of Hazzardous [II]; More Press Mistakes!; The Cracked Annoyance Barometer; Cracked's Cartoon Showcase Featuring Jeff Keate; A Cracked Look at an Airport Terminal; The Cracked Manual of Modern Merchandising Methods; The Jabbersons; Crack Ups! Featuring: The Child Psychiatrist; You're in Trouble If...; The Cracked History of Aviation; Cracked Interviews the Cracked Magazine King; Shut-Ups!; Great Moments in History: Igwar Nagoolik Invents Reading
ComicInfo.Summary:
A satire of the television show THE DUKES OF HAZZARD.
A satire of the television show THE JEFFERSONS.
ComicInfo.Penciller: John Severin,John Langton,Bill Ward,Jeff Keate,Warren Sattler,Sam Whitehead,Don Orehek
ComicInfo.Inker: John Severin,John Langton,Bill Ward,Jeff Keate,Warren Sattler,Sam Whitehead,Don Orehek
